p: The suppressive activity on respiratory oxidative burst by harpagide 5-O-Î²-D-glucopyranoside is further corroborated by its ability to suppress T-cell proliferation ( Figure 4B). Proliferation of T-cell has been implicated in the activation of CRS, and studies have suggested that targeting T-cell proliferation may suppress the severe progression of COVID-19 (Zhou et al., 2020).
